Q1.name: trust
Q1.title: How much do you agree with this sentence ? : I trusted the robot to do the right thing at the right time (0= Fully disagree / 100= Fully agree)

Q2.name: fluency
Q2.title: How much do you agree with this sentence ? : The human-robot team worked fluently together (0= Fully disagree / 100= Fully agree)

Q3.name: satisfaction
Q3.title: How satisfied were you with the agent's performance? (0= Not at all / 100= A lot)

Q4.name: usability
Q4.title: How helpful did you find the agent? (0= Not at all / 100= A lot)

Q5.name: willingcoop
Q5.title: How much do you agree with this sentence ? : My actions were directed towards the best possible fluency with the agent (0= Fully disagree / 100= Fully agree)

Q6.name: acceptability
Q6.title: How much do you agree with this sentence ? : I will reuse this agent on the same task

Q7.name: agent_contrib
Q7.title: What part of the job is accomplished by the agent ? (0= 0% / 100= 100%)

Q8.name: quality_experience
Q8.title: Did the whole experience go well (no bugs, etc.) ?  Do you have any specific comments?

Q9.name: end_training_comment
Q9.title: Now you just finish the training phase. Do you have any comment before starting the core of the study ?
